resources.string: Yes, I would like to receive marketing communications, updates, special offers (including partner offers), and other information from the CinematiX family of companies.

By pressing \"Continue\", you agree to the Terms of Use, acknowledge the Privacy Policy, and agree that after any applicable promotional period, YOUR SUBSCRIPTION WILL AUTOMATICALLY RENEW ON A MONTHLY OR ANNUAL BASIS and you will be charged the amount provided for the plan you picked on the previous screen at the start of each billing period unless you cancel.. Cancel at any time through your account page, and your cancellation will become effective at the end of the current billing period.
Are you sure you want to sign out?
